Name: Tiny Toy Tanks
About the game: About: In Tiny Toy Tanks you are in control of a small blue tank. Your Goal is to destroy all the opposing tanks in 40+ hand crafted levels. Opposing tanks have different AI with different strengths and weaknesses. Moreover, every level has many other mechanics like TNT, Magnets and more. The Tanks Player controlled it can turbo and lay mines. Brown Tanks Attack speed is slow and does not move Gray Tanks Attack speed is slow and can move Blue Tanks High-speed rockets Yellow Tanks Can place mines Green Tanks Super aim technology Red Tanks Large number of rockets Purple Tanks Evasion technology
Meta Title: Tiny Toy Tanks: Nov 20, 2020, Retro Gears and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Tiny Toy Tanks? Check out the release date (Nov 20, 2020), developer insights from Retro Gears, and a complete game summary.
